Uses of Class
co.cask.coopr.scheduler.dag.TaskNode

  • Packages that use TaskNode 
    Package Description
    co.cask.coopr.scheduler
    Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks.
    co.cask.coopr.scheduler.dag
    Classes for creating and linearizing task DAGs.

    • Uses of TaskNode in co.cask.coopr.scheduler

      Methods in co.cask.coopr.scheduler that return types with arguments of type TaskNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Set<TaskNode>> JobPlanner.linearizeDependentTasks()
      Create a plan of tasks to be executed in order to perform the cluster operation.

    • Uses of TaskNode in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.dag

      Methods in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.dag that return types with arguments of type TaskNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Set<TaskNode>> TaskDag.linearize()
      Linearize the DAG into a list of stages, where each stage is a set of tasks that can be executed in parallel, and where each task in a stage can only be executed once all the tasks in the previous stage have successfully completed.
      Methods in co.cask.coopr.scheduler.dag with parameters of type TaskNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskDag.addDependency(TaskNode fromNode, TaskNode toNode)
      Defines a dependency between task fromNode to toNode.
      void TaskDag.addTaskNode(TaskNode node)
      Add a node without any edges, meaning nothing depends on this node (yet).
